hero.title: About Us
hero.description: At Axolotl Code, our passion for innovation and digital development drives us to build solutions that transform ideas into technological realities. Discover who we are and how we can help you achieve your goals.

about.title: Learn about our history
about.text-1: Axolotl Code was born with the mission of transforming our clients' ideas into high-impact technological solutions. From our beginnings, we have prioritized innovation, quality, and security in every project, working with a committed and passionate team.
about.text-2: Throughout our journey, we have helped companies from various sectors modernize their processes and achieve their objectives in an ever-evolving digital world. We take pride in being strategic allies in our clients' technological transformation.
about.alt: About Us - Get to Know Us

mision.title: Mission
mision.description: To develop innovative and customized technological solutions that optimize our clients' business processes, ensuring security, efficiency, and quality in each project, while promoting the use of modern technologies to contribute to their business success.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be leaders in software development in Mexico, recognized for the excellence and innovation of our technological solutions, establishing trusted relationships with our clients and making a significant impact on companies' digital transformation.

step-1.title: Research and Information Gathering
step-1.description: Let's discover together what you need and how we can achieve it.

step-2.title: Planning (sitemap, wireframes, etc.)
step-2.description: We structure your ideas to bring your project to life.

step-3.title: Website Design and Prototypes
step-3.description: We create attractive sketches that reflect your vision.

step-4.title: Content Creation
step-4.description: We give voice to your site with impactful texts and images.

step-5.title: Frontend and Backend Development
step-5.description: We build your site to work perfectly and look amazing.

step-6.title: Quality Testing and Deployment
step-6.description: We adjust the final details for a smooth launch.

step-7.title: Maintenance and Updates
step-7.description: We ensure your site remains spectacular over time.

next-level.title: Are you ready to take your ideas to the next level?
next-level.description: Let's talk and discover how we can help you. Or explore our options and find the perfect solution for your business.

hero.title: Plans and Services
hero.description: Discover our solutions designed to adapt to your needs. We offer personalized services to take your projects to the next level, with flexible plans and options that adjust to each stage of your growth.

footer.description: At AxolotlCode, we transform ideas into digital realities. We create innovative, secure, and customized applications that drive your business towards success.
